Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Many have participated in the ceremony
on this island. <sp:5:0:0>You showed that you have
courage surpassing them all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>This is to commemorate your incredible
record. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:TalkPositive_00>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>I do not recall ever
seeing a faster time than that.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Many have participated in the ceremony
on this island. <sp:5:0:0>You showed that you have
courage surpassing them all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>This is to commemorate your incredible
record. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>Another new record!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>That was very well done. <sp:5:0:0>It is a treat to
witness you overcoming the records you
previously set.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>This is to commemorate your incredible
time. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>You may have it in you to break the
current record of <clr:0000><sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Hello. <sp:5:0:0>It is nice to end my day with
a visit from you.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Would you kindly tell me your name?<sp:5:1:0>
I ask so that I can register you as the
record holder.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_01>This is to honor your incredible record. <sp:5:0:0>
You have earned it.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Thank you. <sp:5:0:0>I have registered your record
under the name of Link.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I have sad news. <sp:5:0:0>Your decision to leave
the course has disqualified this attempt.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Hmm? <sp:5:1:0>Your pouch is full. <sp:5:0:0>This poses a
problem for the reward you have earned.
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I will hold the <clr:0000>large Zonai charge <clr:ffff>until you
have made room for it in your pouch.
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>I will guide you to the starting position.<sp:5:0:0>
Please seek authorization at the terminal.
Talk_59:
<snd:QuestionNormal_00>Will you attempt the dive ceremony once
more? Each attempt requires an offering
of <clr:0000>one Zonai charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Will you start the dive ceremony? <sp:5:0:0>I am
eager to see your courage on display.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL><sp:5:0:0>Oh my. <sp:5:1:0>I did not realize you were
unfamiliar with the dive ceremony.<sp:0:4:0>Please indulge me as I explain.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>The dive ceremony is for Zonai youths
to show their courage and be recognized
as adults.<sp:0:4:0>There is a sky island high above here
which serves as the starting position.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_01>Dive from that island and <clr:0000>pass through all
the rings<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>the time allowed<clr:ffff>.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I respect your effort.<sp:0:4:0>My advice for your next attempt is to
<clr:0000>accelerate<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>The trick is to go as fast as
your courage will allow.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_00>Very well. <sp:5:1:0>We should start with a trial run
of the course.<sp:0:4:0>There is no time limit. <sp:5:1:0>Relax and get a
feel for the ceremony. <sp:5:0:0>But be sure to
<clr:0000>pass through all of the rings<clr:ffff>.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You have proven your deep courage with
the fastest speed ever recorded. <sp:5:0:0>I hope
that you can continue to improve on it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>My explanation is complete. <sp:5:0:0>Are you ready
to begin the dive ceremony?
Talk_22:
<snd:Sad_00><sp:3:0:2:0a01>You did not pass through all of the rings.<sp:5:0:0>
Please return to me.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>All those who complete the ceremony are
awarded the prize of a <clr:0000>special outfit<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I hope that clears things up. <sp:5:0:0>Are you
ready to begin the dive ceremony?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>I have sad news. <sp:5:0:0>Your failure to pass
through all of the rings has disqualified
this attempt.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Is that so? <sp:5:0:0>I hope to see you again for
another attempt sometime.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Then I will guide you to the starting
position. <sp:5:1:0>Please pass through all of the
rings <clr:0000>within <sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_00>I am excited for your next attempt.<sp:5:0:0>
Farewell.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You have already shown your courage.<sp:5:1:0>
But I think you can truly excel.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>My explanation is complete. <sp:5:0:0>Are you ready
to begin the dive ceremony?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Thank you for doing a trial run of the
course. <sp:5:0:0>I am pleased to see that you
completed it safely.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I will hold the <clr:0000>special outfit<clr:ffff> that signifies
your maturity until you have made room
for it in your pouch.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>You did not pass through all of the rings.<sp:5:0:0>
I suggest returning here.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>I congratulate you on completing the
ceremony. But you must not grow
complacent.<sp:0:4:0>The ceremony has been completed in
as little as <clr:0000><sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>. Continue to
improve so that you can do better.
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I see your pouch now has room in it for
your prize. <sp:5:1:0>Very good.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You completed the trial run of the course
on your own volition. <sp:5:0:0>I am pleased to host
such an enthusiastic challenger.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_00>It is a good idea to relax and fall slowly.<sp:5:0:0>
That ensures you do not lose sight of
the position of each ring.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I will guide you to the start once again.<sp:5:0:0>
I am sure you can <clr:0000>pass through all of
the rings <clr:ffff>on your next attempt.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_01>This outfit is proof of your maturity.<sp:5:0:0>
You have earned it.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I think the time is right to begin the
dive ceremony. <sp:5:1:0>Are you prepared?
Talk_46: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_00>That is not all I have for you.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>How do you do? It is good to see a
challenger attempt the dive ceremony
so early in the morning.
Talk_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will hold the <clr:0000>five steering-stick capsules<clr:ffff>
intended to celebrate your attempt until
you have made room in your pouch.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>How do you do? <sp:5:0:0>Are you a dive-ceremony
challenger?
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will hold the <clr:0000>five hover-stone capsules<clr:ffff>
intended to celebrate your attempt until
you have made room in your pouch.
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>How do you do? It is good to see that we
still get dive ceremony challengers this
late at night.
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will hold the <clr:0000>five shock-emitter capsules<clr:ffff>
intended to celebrate your attempt until
you have made room in your pouch.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:TalkPositive_00>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>I do not recall ever
seeing a faster time than that.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>First things first. <sp:5:0:0>I have here the proof of
your maturity. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>I must ask one thing before we begin.<sp:5:0:0>
Please offer <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zonai charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_01>It is an ancient tradition for participants in
the ceremony to offer a Zonai charge.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>There have been no ceremonies for a long
time. This has resulted in a shortage of
Zonai charges. <sp:5:1:0>You see the problem.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Is that so? <sp:5:0:0>Then I hope to see you
again sometime.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_01>Oh? <sp:5:1:0>You have fewer <clr:0000>Zonai charges <clr:ffff>than
I was hoping.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh dear. <sp:5:1:0>This has never happened
before. <sp:5:0:0>I am not sure how to handle
such a situation.<sp:0:4:0>I have an idea. <sp:5:0:0>I will allow you to
participate without an offering just
this once. <sp:5:0:0>That seems only fair.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>But now you know the requirements.<sp:5:0:0>
I cannot do this for you again. <sp:5:1:0>Please
do not tell anyone I did it even once.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>It seems you do not have any <clr:0000>Zonai
charges<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I wish that I could allow you to
do the ceremony anyway. But I cannot.<sp:0:4:0>Do not forget to bring Zonai charges
the next time you wish to perform the
dive ceremony.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>. I respect your effort.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>But you did not meet the target time
of <clr:0000><sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>This attempt must be
recorded as a failure.<sp:0:4:0>I cannot stress enough the importance of
<clr:0000>acceleration<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>The trick is to go as fast as
your courage will allow.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>You have left the course! <sp:5:1:0>Please wait
there while I come to retrieve you.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Work_01>I must ask one thing before we begin.<sp:5:0:0>
Please offer <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zonai charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Hello. <sp:5:0:0>It is good to see you here first
thing in the morning.
